meta.title: Dr. med. Mustermann
meta.metatitle: Welcome at the Family and Children's Practice Mustermann

intro.title:
In the right place::
Family and Children's Practice Mustermann
intro.text:
The friendly GP practice on Bahnhofstrasse has been helping young and old with health complaints, prevention and general health support for 3 decades.

Welcome!

team.title: Our Medical Team
team.text: With our team of specialists, you have a wide range of skills and many years of practical experience at your disposal. We are happy to welcome you in four languages.

persons.name: Dr. med. Max Mustermann
persons.title: Specialist for General Internal Medicine
persons.text: Medical Director. Languages: German, English, French. Specialities: paediatrics and laboratory technology. Publication list: here.

persons.name: Prof. Dr. med. Mara Musterfrau
persons.title: Specialist in Cardiology and Angiology
persons.text: Languages: German, English, Spanish. Specialised in generics and polypharmacy.

practice.title: Our Practice
practice.text: Our air-conditioned, well-maintained practice has state-of-the-art diagnostics, a laboratory for the most common tests, two treatment rooms and a waiting room that also makes waiting time fun for your children. Our team is looking forward to meeting you.

images.title: Together
images.description: we attach great importance to patient information

images.title: Front Office
images.description: there for you by phone, email and on site

images.title: Waiting Room
images.description: here, neither young nor old will be bored

reservation.title: Reserve your Appointment
reservation.text: Of course you can also register by telephone on 044 321 67 80.

arrival.title: Arrival
arrival.text:
We are open from Monday to Friday from 8 am to 5 pm for you.

You will find us at Musterstrasse 1, 8000 Musterstadt on the second floor. Our practice is easily accessible by public transport and by car and is wheelchair accessible throughout. 

Tram stops 7, 11, 13 and 6 (Bahnhofstrasse) are located in front of the building. There are two free parking spaces for patients in the basement. 

You are welcome to use the travel aids below.

questions.question: What costs does my insurance cover?
questions.answer: Normally, all costs are covered by the general insurance. If a service, e.g. special laboratory tests, would not be covered, we will inform you so that you can decide whether you want to have them done and at what time.

questions.question: How long does an initial assessment take?
questions.answer: An initial assessment usually takes no longer than 60 minutes.

questions.question: What do I need to bear in mind on my first visit?
questions.answer: If possible, fill out the digital master sheet including the medical history before the visit. This way your consultation is optimally prepared.

questions.question: May I choose the doctor?
questions.answer: Yes, of course you are free to choose which doctor you would like to be advised and treated by.
